column5: Our home is located on a cul-de-sac in a quiet, family friendly neighborhood & comfortably fits 2 guests.   Includes 1 bedroom (Queen memory foam bed), private bathroom, & exclusive access to lounge (fridge, microwave, TV with Netflix).   ~0.5 miles from Starbucks, grocery store, emergency clinic, gas station, & quick food options  ~5 minutes from Shops at Legacy, corporate headquarters, 50+ restaurants (we will guide you to the best ones!), & quick access to Dallas North Tollway & 121!
column8: Private Upstairs Loft of Cozy, Quiet Home in Plano
